body_html:
I also want group convolution in tensorflow. I found that tweet about efficiently implementing ResNeXt:
https://twitter.com/D_Berthelot_ML/status/907007235577880576
"Thanks @vahidk for the solution, using depthwise convolution with a reshape+sum does the trick. It's 4-5x faster now."
That may not be the ideal solution (maybe not as good as calling cudnn's group convolution primitive), but it may help.
